member.name: M:com.bitscopic.reportservice.src.BitscopicBaseException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: This constructor is required to deserialize this custom exception properly. Any new properties should be added

member.name: M:com.bitscopic.reportservice.src.BitscopicBaseException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: This method is required to serialize the custom properties of the exception. New properties should be added here to ensure they are included in serialization

member.name: M:com.bitscopic.reportservice.svc.ReportServiceController.createReport(System.Object)
member.summary: Generate a PDF or MSWord report from a supported model. The template used will be inferred by the model's ReportID property and the resulting report format will be determined by the model's OutputFormat. The model should be supplied inside the request's body as json.
member.remarks: The request body should contain a single json model.
member.returns: If the request is valid, a stringified json object representing a FileSystemFile will be returned. This will include the report as a byte array, a default filename for the report and other metadata about the byte array. If the request is invalid, a stringified json object representing a RequestFault will be returned containing information about the exception.
